title: Publish v0.2.0 to PyPI
description:
**As a** Python developer
**I want** Consoul available on PyPI
**So that** I can install it with `pip install consoul`

**Context:**
After v0.2.0 git tag is created, publish the package to PyPI. This is the first public PyPI release (0.1.0 may have been test/private).

Requirements:
- PyPI account with 2FA enabled
- API token configured
- Package builds successfully
- All metadata correct in pyproject.toml

**Technical Notes:**
- Build with: `poetry build`
- Publish with: `poetry publish` or `twine upload dist/*`
- Test on TestPyPI first (optional but recommended)
- Verify package metadata on PyPI after upload
- Check that documentation links work

**Acceptance Criteria:**

**Given** I build the package
**When** I run `poetry build`
**Then** wheel and sdist are created without errors

**Given** the package is published
**When** I run `pip install consoul`
**Then** version 0.2.0 is installed successfully

**Given** I visit pypi.org/project/consoul
**When** I check the project page
**Then** all metadata is correct and links work

**Given** a user installs consoul
**When** they run `consoul --version`
**Then** it shows version 0.2.0

**Testing Considerations:**
- Test build process locally first
- Check PKG-INFO metadata
- Verify all dependencies are correct
- Test installation in clean virtual environment
- Check that extras install correctly (`pip install consoul[tui]`)
- Verify README renders correctly on PyPI

**Implementation Hints:**
```bash
# 1. Clean previous builds
rm -rf dist/ build/ *.egg-info

# 2. Build package
poetry build

# 3. Check build artifacts
ls -lh dist/
tar -tzf dist/consoul-0.2.0.tar.gz | head -20

# 4. Test on TestPyPI (optional)
poetry config repositories.testpypi https://test.pypi.org/legacy/
poetry publish -r testpypi
pip install --index-url https://test.pypi.org/simple/ consoul

# 5. Publish to PyPI
poetry publish

# 6. Verify
pip install --upgrade consoul
python -c "import consoul; print(consoul.__version__)"
```

**Dependencies:**
- SOUL-214: Version must be updated to 0.2.0
- SOUL-213: Documentation URLs must be correct
- SOUL-221: Git tag v0.2.0 must exist
- All EPIC-010 tickets should be complete

**Post-Publish Checklist:**
- [ ] Package appears on https://pypi.org/project/consoul/
- [ ] pip install works
- [ ] Version displays correctly
- [ ] Documentation link works
- [ ] All extras install (tui, pdf, ollama-library, etc.)
